metadata.title: USN-4700-1 -- PyXDG vulnerability
metadata.description: Alexandre D'Hondt discovered that PyXDG did not properly sanitize input. An attacker could exploit this with a crafted .menu file to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4700-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-xdg - 0.25-4ubuntu0.14.04.1~esm1 python-xdg - 0.25-4ubuntu0.14.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
